m :  good morning .  this is john parker speaking .  i ' m just ringing to confirm my appointment with mr .  smith for this afternoon .
w :  yes .  mr .  smith ' s expecting you at 3 o ' clock .

question: why is the man making the phone call ?
choice: he wants to make an appointment with mr .  smith .
he wants to make sure that mr .  smith will see him .
he wants to change the time of the appointment .
answer: he wants to make sure that mr .  smith will see him .
